additional_citations: Foissner, W. 1993. Colpodea (Ciliophora). Gustav Fischer Verlag, Stuttgart. 798 p.

importance: Aristerostoma sp. represents the class COLPODEA. Study of Aristerostoma is also scientifically compelling as this is the only marine colpodean in a culture collection, and it and related species are bacterivores in marine benthic food webs.
